class.name: GDExtensionManager
class.description: The GDExtensionManager loads, initializes, and keeps track of all available [GDExtension] libraries in the project. [b]Note:[/b] Do not worry about GDExtension unless you know what you are doing.

method.name: get_extension
method.description: Returns the [GDExtension] at the given file [param path], or [code]null[/code] if it has not been loaded or does not exist.

method.name: get_loaded_extensions
method.description: Returns the file paths of all currently loaded extensions.

method.name: is_extension_loaded
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the extension at the given file [param path] has already been loaded successfully. See also [method get_loaded_extensions].

method.name: load_extension
method.description: Loads an extension by absolute file path. The [param path] needs to point to a valid [GDExtension]. Returns [constant LOAD_STATUS_OK] if successful.

method.name: load_extension_from_function
method.description: Loads the extension already in address space via the given path and initialization function. The [param path] needs to be unique and start with [code]"libgodot://"[/code]. Returns [constant LOAD_STATUS_OK] if successful.

method.name: reload_extension
method.description: Reloads the extension at the given file path. The [param path] needs to point to a valid [GDExtension], otherwise this method may return either [constant LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED] or [constant LOAD_STATUS_FAILED]. [b]Note:[/b] You can only reload extensions in the editor. In release builds, this method always fails and returns [constant LOAD_STATUS_FAILED].

method.name: unload_extension
method.description: Unloads an extension by file path. The [param path] needs to point to an already loaded [GDExtension], otherwise this method returns [constant LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED].

signal.name: extension_loaded
signal.description: Emitted after the editor has finished loading a new extension.

signal.name: extension_unloading
signal.description: Emitted before the editor starts unloading an extension.

signal.name: extensions_reloaded
signal.description: Emitted after the editor has finished reloading one or more extensions. [b]Note:[/b] This signal is only emitted in editor builds.
